description:
A free puzzle game with simple rules.

Drag and drop the blocks into the board, then clear the blocks by making a line of full bricks horizontally or vertically.

This puzzle game ends when you don't have enough space to put a given block into the board.

1010 :) How to play:
- Simply drag and drop given blocks to fill board.
- Try to make full lines horizontally or vertically.
- The more lines you clear at the same time, the more scores you will get.
- Game ends if there is no more space for any given blocks.
- Given blocks can't be rotated.

1010 :) Features:
- A Simple, Free and Fun block puzzle game that keeps your brain healthy.
- Save game.
- Support Game Center Leaderboard.
- Classic, Obstacle and Advanced game mode.
- Share scores with your friends.
- Offer in-app purchase.
- Smart block movement.

Have fun!!
